column5: To all of you who partake in the Ugly shirt Friday fun, here is todays magic combo's.  PS, Wayne, I didn't get any SS chicken for you, sorry. Phil, have a happy b-day bud!
Thanks Geoff.  Now i need to get my retinas scraped and resurfaced
What the hell did I start....
Your better off to use brain bleach.  it gets rid of everything bad...  Oh, you just wish you were here too so you can see it in it's full glory!
It's been said before and will likely be said again... "Not everyone can get away with wearing a shirt like that!" HH
Yup, you win Geoff  But is it really a win.........?
The Beach Boys hard at work I see.

I had to dumb down the ugly as I hold a very responsible position today.  I am Fire Marshall Phil of the floor.  I feel good knowing my co worker families can rest easy beacause I am on the job. I can't find my whistle though.    BTW, Geoff, thanks for the wishes.
Well i for one, want to thank you Wayne. It Cured the cateract in my left eye Its a Miracle i say
Happy BDay bud.  Here we dress down,some more then others.
*In husky voice* "Just put your lips together and blow"  Happy Birthday as well.
Hey Phil.  With all that orange on, do NOT try and bite your ear while talking!!  they may send you away thinking you got out of the loonie bin....

Happy BDay bud, whomever you are OFNER   Have a good One!  Here we dress down,some more then others.     hahahahahhaa   !!    Dang i do Love this place-Unique on the internet-to be sure OFC   This is sure to be one of many OFC 'Classics Moments'   NICE Shirts Dudes --do they come in Mens?   just kidding   Heaven forbid this post receives thousands of Clicks like the --'What Music are YOU Listening to Now'- Autograph's Initiative   The CRTC will shut us down for too much Spectrum Usage   lol  -Y'all just get back from Key West Florida with those shirts?   Sale @ BPS?   Great Stuff   OK---All in here--  we are off lookin for Friday Shirts   Could be a while--snap a cap   Have a good wekend All  Cheers   Paul
HAHAHAHA, some folks take me too serious.  "Let me show you something"
Happy birthday bud!

Ya see it,s like this,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,    I cant see pics at work,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,   Now that I can,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,     Sorry,I cant stop laughing at ya fellas  Sad souls.   Phil,,,,,,,,,,,,  Go fishing will ya.LOL            LMAO
Allow me,,,,,,,,,  OOPS, wife deleted that pic.
OH NO!  You are not going to trick me into going to www.pleantyofphil.com AGAIN!!!  or was that .ca?  either way no WAY!!!!
Come on guys.... lol
Do we win anything if we can pick the two guys who didn't have to go out to buy a Friday shirt?

i have at least 50 shirts like those...seriously....ya have to be very secure with your masculinity to pull it off all the time...lol...and it doesnt hurt that i get random kisses from strange near sited women either...
